noppes.npcs.api.entity.ICustomNpc

Packages that use ICustomNpc
Package
Description
noppes.npcs.api
 
noppes.npcs.api.entity.data.role
 
noppes.npcs.api.event
This package contains event classes whose instances are dispatched to the corresponding hook functions (if present) in CNPC scripts.
noppes.npcs.api.handler.data
